value.title: The top 50 Middle East & North Africa venture investors
value.content:
Over 1,300 MENA investors backed equity deals in the last year, creating a competitive landscape where strategic positioning is crucial.  To differentiate themselves, top firms like Aramco Ventures are aggressively pursuing deals in high-growth areas such as manufacturing, AI, and …
The post The top 50 Middle East & North Africa venture investors appeared first on CB Insights Research.
